txt.en: 'My friend, [placeholder]. I am glad to see you again. The Dead have returned to the old ruins in the north-western part of Ringló Vale. They hide in the ancient structures. Perhaps you would be able to ward the doors and expel the dead from these buildings?\n\n'I do not know why the Dead still walk the Vale. Drugât no longer commands them. Why do they not return closer to the stone that curses them?'
Arvaethor is in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Arvaethor.
After the events in the Nimrond caverns, Ringló Vale faces continued threats, including the Dead who still lurk in the Vale.
Ancient structures can be found in Dâr Matum and the western end of Nimrond.\n\nYou should expel the Dead from structures in the north-western part of Ringló Vale.
Expelled the Dead from ancient structures ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'I thank you for expelling the Ruthless Dead from the ancient structures in the White Mountains, but it is still unknown as to why they wander here.'
Expel Dead from the ancient structures ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
